      • GetConfiguredInterfaces

        public EnablerInterface[] GetConfiguredInterfaces(EnablerInterface.EnablerInterfaceType Type)
                                           throws EnablerException
        Returns an array of EnablerInterface objects for all configured interfaces for a particular type.
        Parameters:
        Type - - Type of interface to request
        Returns:
        An array of EnablerInterface objects
        Throws:
        EnablerException

      • GetInterface

        public EnablerInterface GetInterface(EnablerInterface.EnablerInterfaceType Type,
                            int ID)
                              throws EnablerException
        Get the status of Enabler interface card.

        This function will return an EnablerInterface class for the requested interface. Type = 0 returns the PCI card status. ID = 0 to X returns the statuses of the connected Enabler interface card.

        Parameters:
        Type - - Type of interface to get
        ID - - ID of interface to get
        Returns:
        EnablerInterface
        Throws:
        EnablerException
